Class ProductDAO

java.lang.Object
com.greengrocer.database.ProductDAO
public class ProductDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for Product operations. Handles all database operations related to products.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProductDAO()
    Constructor - initializes database adapter.

      Constructor - initializes database adapter.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public List<Product> findAll()
      Gets all products sorted by name.
      Returns:
      List of all products

    • findByType

      public List<Product> findByType(String type)
      Gets all products of a specific type (VEGETABLE or FRUIT), sorted by name. Only returns products with stock > 0.
      Parameters:
      type - The product type
      Returns:
      List of products of the specified type

    • getVegetables

      public List<Product> getVegetables()
      Gets all vegetables with stock > 0, sorted by name.
      Returns:
      List of vegetables

    • getFruits

      public List<Product> getFruits()
      Gets all fruits with stock > 0, sorted by name.
      Returns:
      List of fruits

    • searchByName

      public List<Product> searchByName(String keyword)
      Searches products by name keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The search keyword
      Returns:
      List of matching products

    • findById

      public Product findById(int id)
      Finds a product by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The product ID
      Returns:
      Product or null if not found

    • existsByName

      public boolean existsByName(String name)
      Checks if a product with the given name already exists.
      Parameters:
      name - The product name to check
      Returns:
      true if a product with this name exists

    • existsByNameExcluding

      public boolean existsByNameExcluding(String name, int excludeId)
      Checks if a product with the given name exists, excluding a specific ID. Used when updating a product to allow keeping the same name.
      Parameters:
      name - The product name to check
      excludeId - The product ID to exclude from the check
      Returns:
      true if another product with this name exists

    • add

      public boolean add(Product product)
      Adds a new product.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to add
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • update

      public boolean update(Product product)
      Updates an existing product.
      Parameters:
      product - The product with updated information
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • updateWithImage

      public boolean updateWithImage(Product product)
      Updates product with image.
      Parameters:
      product - The product with updated information including image
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • delete

      public boolean delete(int id)
      Deletes a product.
      Parameters:
      id - The product ID to delete
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • updateStock

      public boolean updateStock(int productId, double quantity)
      Updates the stock of a product.
      Parameters:
      productId - The product ID
      quantity - The quantity to subtract from stock
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • hasEnoughStock

      public boolean hasEnoughStock(int productId, double quantity)
      Checks if there is enough stock for the requested quantity.
      Parameters:
      productId - The product ID
      quantity - The requested quantity
      Returns:
      true if enough stock available

    • findAllIncludingOutOfStock

      public List<Product> findAllIncludingOutOfStock()
      Gets all products including those with zero stock (for owner).
      Returns:
      List of all products
